transcript:
Customer: Sir ek account se thoda sa jyada idea hai kya iska?
Executive: Rukhiye ek minute ticket dalne ke bahut chilla rahe hain ticket ke liye.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji namaskar sir Prabhat baat karunga IndiaMART se main aapke sath.
Customer: Haan ji Prabhat ji bataiye.
Executive: Ji sir main keh raha tha ye aap sir kya issue aa raha hai aapne ek case bhi dala tha sir profile ke liye kya aapka refund ke liye aap bol rahe the sir.
Customer: Haan meri baat kafi dino se ho rahi hai kareeb saat aath das din ho gaye maine unse sirf itna kaha hai ki mera teen mahine abhi maine registration ko hua hai mera koi business run nahi kar raha agle ek dedh saal mein run nahi kar pa raha hun to mera ko registration ke hisab se abhi to aapka char mahine ho jayenge thode din mein.
Executive: Thode din mein char mahine kaise mahine ke hisab se mera mera to sir November 2 November ko teen mahine hue hain abhi November bhi kitna hua hai 8 10 12 November hua hai.
Customer: Service matlab 2 August se service chal rahi thi pura August, September, October teen mahine udhar ho gaye aur November 17 din matlab teen mahine sadhe teen mahine ho gaye.
Executive: To sir uske liye hum kya karenge November abhi nau mahine sadhe aath mahine service hai na.
Customer: Dugne samay se jyada ka time hai mere paas mein bhi registration ke liye ek saal ka humne liya hai pura.
Executive: Bilkul sir to matlab isme refund ka to sir aisa policy mein to aapko kahin likh ke bhi nahi diya gaya hoga kahin kisi ne bola tha bhi nahi hoga to refund ka to possible hi nahi ho pata sir isko use kijiye kaam bhi milega ek saal ka aapne contact liya hai na sir isko ek saal use kijiye.
Customer: Ek saal mein use karke bhai sahab kya karenge client se sirf relation kharab honge hum jab delivery hi nahi kar payenge product.
Customer: Hum use kya karenge usko.
Executive: Matlab kya dikkat hai business close kar rahe hain kya aap.
Customer: Business mein partners ke beech mein dispute ho gaya hai wo nahi kaam chal pa raha hai maine kai baar saat din se yahi call mein bol raha hun unko mera business run nahi kar raha mujhe IndiaMART se koi problem nahi na lead se koi problem hai main jab run hi nahi kara raha hun main usko utilize hi nahi kar paunga lead ko to main kya leke karunga abhi maine kaha bhi ek dedh saal mera sort out ho jayega to main dobara se registration karaunga mera ek dusra profile bhi aap kya aath das saal se bana hua hai kareeb Tirth export ke naam se.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Main to kafi dino se service aapki use kar raha hun lekin abhi ye naya registration maine karaya hai ye chal nahi pa raha hai to main kyun ye 30 35000 mere bekar chale jayenge.
Executive: Sir sir aisa beech mein sir clause nahi hota hai na sir rokne ka dekhiye main to main karwa deta but refund ki policy nahi hai sir isko ya to temporary aap ye kijiye product vagarah hata ke chhod dijiye kyunki refund ki policy nahi hai ab baki sir aap ek baat bataiye buyleads vagarah promotion bhi chal raha hai aapka koi naya product dal dijiye.
Customer: Promotion mera promotion ka to aap kah hi nahi sakte kyunki abhi bhi aap dekhoge na mere paas mushkil se teen char mahine mein ek do teen call aayi hongi jo bhi prayas hai main hi apni taraf se kar raha tha promotion ka koi benefit maine liya hi nahi kyunki mere paas koi call aayi ho maine baat ki ho aath das call aayi ho koi client hai hi nahi main hi apni taraf se try kar raha tha us promotion ka mere ko koi benefit nahi hai main pehle ye bata de raha hun aur nahi sachhi log dispute bhi hai ki aakhir kab tak main apne akele manage karunga us har cheez ko to wahi mera dispute ka karan ban raha hai aur main abhi run kar nahi paunga maine promotion koi benefit liya ho to profile bhi check kar lo.
Executive: Nahi baat uski sahi hai hamari yahi call aapki taraf se aa rahi hai barabar ki main call karun main call kar raha hun lekin main call ab kyun karunga jab mere ko nahi lag raha kuch aisa chal pa raha hai to main bekar mein main bar bar yahi baat bol raha hun repeat hoke sabhi logon ko aapko pehle hi baat ho chuki teen char logon se meri maine bhi yahi rakha unke samne main bhai business nahi chal raha mera mera refund jo bhi ho aap possible ho aap refund aap kar dijiye kyunki dedh saal mein kuch chala nahi paunga 30 32000 bekar jane wale hain mere.
Customer: Thoda bahut amount hota to main maan leta main char 10000 amount hota chhod diya.
Executive: Lekin 35 33000 maine diye hain sir aap khud sochiye abhi char mahine hue hain aath mahine promotion ke liye pade hue hain mere paas mein aath sadhe aath mahine bacha hua hai time mera.
Customer: Sir matlab ek nahi bataiye mujhe na lag raha hai ki business aapko nahi mil pa raha is karan se main reason ye hai aapko chhod ke jane ka.
Executive: Business mil nahi pa raha business mil jayega IndiaMART se lead mil jayega client mil jayega lekin product hi hum deliver nahi kar payenge.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: IndiaMART hame lead de dega mujhe pata hai main 10 saal se Tirth export naam se firm mere aapke yahan registered hai mujhe pata hai us pe hi meri rating hai lekin main product deliver hi nahi kar paunga client se relation kharab honge agar hum call karenge unko to.
Executive: Sir thode din mein kuch aur product dal ke use kar lijiye jo aapke paas ye thode din ye jo teen sadhe teen mahine ke liye aap bol rahe ho main pehle pehle mahine mein hi bol deta lekin maine teen saal mein sirf yahi koshish ki ki chal jayega jab bilkul hi khatam ho gaya tab maine baat kiya otherwise main baat hi nahi karta maine call bhi kiya dedh mahine shuru mein kafi 30 35 meri call bhi hain baat bhi maine prayas bhi kiya aisa nahi ki main lena nahi chahta tha maine aise karke aise le raha hun maine prayas kiya us cheez ko sort out karne ka lekin wo cheez sort out nahi ho rahi to main ab kya kar sakta hun paise bach jaye bach jaye mere liye kaam aayenge otherwise wo bhi dub jayenge.
Customer: Sir main bilkul samajh raha hun maine management mein discuss bhi kiya tha sir but wo cheez possible nahi ho payegi main to dobara baat kar leta hun kuch possibility ho to main aapko update karta kyunki kahin se bhi sir hota kya hai sir ya to hum yahi option dete hain customer ko ki dekhiye one year mein hum customer ko isliye shuruat mein dete hain usme likha bhi hota hai ki sir one year tak aapko chalana padega beech mein kisi kisi customer ka aisa registration aata hai to usme kya hum kar sakte hain kyunki company bhi to us hisab se production vagarah work karti hai sara hum bhi aage payment karte hain designing ka production ka wo sara kuch hum bhi to kar dete hain sir sari cheez ye nahi uski dekhiye jo jo 30 35000 fees hai wo pure saal ki aapne jo kuch kiya hoga mujhe do char panch hazaar designer ka sirf product bhi even maine hi upload kiye hain unhone sirf ek profile main bhi sir IT mein hi kaam karta hun 20 saal ka experience hai mujhe ek multinational company mein main technical lead hun main website banata hun deliver karta hun sare clients mere US ke hain ek profile bana ke site dalne ka koi bada kaam nahi hota catalog banane ka lekin maine apne product catalog khud hi manage kiye baith ke screen share karke kyunki main khud kar sakta hun ye.
Executive: Sir hum SEO bhi karte hain SEO bhi karte hain to usme bhi sir charges hote hain hum aapki SEO ke sir bhi koi single bhi mere paas potential client aapki taraf se calls aayi hoti aap check kar lo profile koi marketing ka maine benefit liya ho aapki main hi call kar raha hun apni taraf se koi udhar se koi benefit nahi koi client mere ko call kiya ho bhai aapne product aapko mere chahiye main follow up le raha hun.
Customer: Bataiye sir main thoda sa customer mein main aapko improve kara ke business ka result dilwata hun sir nishchint rahiye bhai sahab main result lene ke liye tayar hun main dobara registration kara mere even maine 60000 wale plan ki baat ki thi aapke bande se ki main kar lekin mere paas mein product available nahi hai main perfume deliver nahi kar paunga abhi jo partnership mein jo papers bane hue hain business ke wo sare mein dispute ki vajah se wo sab mujhe update karane padenge chartered accountant kafi time lega usme partnership disturb ho gayi na meri ab main deliver kaise karun kis base pe.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART to aap de doge improve karega client lekin main deliver nahi kar pa raha hun tab main baat kar raha hun main IndiaMART ki koi kami nahi gina raha hun main sirf ye keh raha hun sir main product deliver karne ki sthiti mein abhi nahi hun main dusre direction mein chala gaya hun mujhe paper work kafi karane padenge aur next financial year tak hi ye success ho payega.
Customer: To main kya karun main maine to apni problem rakhi bhai main nahi chala pa raha hun abhi aap char mahine hue hain aath mahine pade hue hain mere ek cheez sochiye jo matlab aapne payment kiya hoga do partner partner ke form pe payment hua hoga na ye proprietor ship form thi partner ship form thi ye.
Executive: Meri proprietor ship form hai lekin jo mere delivers hain jo mere vendors hain jo product dete hain unme maal fas gaya paisa fas gaya wo mujhe deliver nahi kar rahe hain dispute ho gaya paisa mera maine deliver de diya wo product mere ko perfume ka mere ko ban ke aa nahi raha hai main proprietor hun mere ko company mein koi partner nahi lekin jo vendors hain jinse main maal kachcha maal kharidta hun banwata hun manufacturing jinse karwata hun unke beech mera paisa fas gaya hai wo deliver nahi kar rahe hain product main aage baat kar lun client se main deliver nahi kar paunga to fayda kya hoga.
Customer: Matlab wo aapko maal nahi de rahe hain ye keh rahe hain aap.
Executive: Matlab maine paise de diye advance paise leke maal manufacture hota hai ab uske price badhte rehte hain ghatte rehte hain market mein wo mere se aur mang rahe hain maine kaha bhai mere se jab deal hui tab itna rate tha isliye maine aapko de diye paise ab aap utne hi rate pe mere ko do attar ka kaam to aap jante ho na lakhon mein hisab kitab hota hai 1 lakh 1.5 lakh liter ka maal banta hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Chandan ka hai samaama hai ye sab itne mahange products hain Qatar mein Arab mein Iran mein har jagah pehle jate the to itne mahange product mein paisa mera fas gaya ab main deliver nahi kar pa raha hun wo dene tayar nahi hai main yahan clienton se aapke through baat kar lun main deliver kahan se karunga.
Executive: Iska aur alternate hoga sir jahan se aap le sakte hain ya to export mein isko convert kara lijiye.
Customer: Bhai ye batao main aapka to 30 35000 ka main wahan saat aath lakh fasaga baitha hun to main kaise lun ab wo paisa chhod dun main mujhe to lena hai ab usme agar court mein jana padega to court mein jayenge lawyer pakdenge jaise bhi hoga mujhe paise to wapas chahiye na mujhe hmm aur paisa yahan bhi maine dal diya marketing mein bhi dal diya aage main to 60000 wala plan lene wala maine fir bhi unse baat ki bhai.
Executive: Aisi policy kahan hai sir kahin bhi ki ab hum main galti ki baat hi nahi kar raha main simply ek baat wahi keh raha hun IndiaMART ki galti kahin mahine do mahine ho jayega to jo lead aapki lapse ho gayi main kuch aapko 50 lead ke aas paas free kara ke de dunga apni taraf se 17000 ki lead jo lapse ho gayi.
Customer: Maine simply ek baar bola ki bhai mera business nahi hai abhi run kar pa raha hai ek dedh saal main in sab cheezon mein time lagega mera 30 32 35000 33000 main de chuka hun pura full payment ek saal ka advance mein maine pehle socha tha monthly lunga wo available nahi tha main isiliye soch raha tha ki monthly le lunga side mera mahine ke hisab se chalta rahega naya online abhi pehli baar kar rahe hain isko lekin unhone kaha bhai pura le lo agar koi dikkat hogi hum deal kar lenge to humne 33000 pura ek dam de diya ab koi sunne wala nahi wahan pe.
Executive: Sir wahi hai na sir refund ka matlab hum hai na abhi jo dete hain us waqt to sari baatein sab cheezon pe agree ho jata hai aadmi ki chalo le kaise paise andar aa jaye maine pura payment kar diya ab koi sunne wala nahi sir ki agar aisa hoga to main refund le lunga to fir main unko dalta ki aapne aisa likh ke diya hoga fir wo cheez hoti bhai sahab kuch baat oral bhi ho jati bharosa hota hai aadmi ka IndiaMART pe mera ek aur profile hai wo 10 saal chal raha hai mujhe pata hai achi company hai kaam deti hai isiliye main liya tha dusra profile maine diya tha inko maine bataya hi mere do GST isme daliye dono hi aage wo product ke liye aayegi wo dono product ke liye lead aap double kharid sakte hain wahan se bhi ho rahi hai wo wo 2014 wo 2014 mein maine firm registered kara ke kaam kiya tha IndiaMART pe 10 saal purana profile tha lekin covid mein mujhe wo GST close karana pad gaya isliye wahi kaam maine dobara naya registration hai dobara fir IndiaMART mein aaya main koi aaj ka customer nahi hun IndiaMART ka.
Customer: Haan to wo product aap naya product dal dijiye ye main allow kar sakta hun aap jo naya product hai wo dal ke bhai product naya dalna to mere control mein aapne control panel de rakha kitne product main khud hi add kar sakta hun ye sab cheezein batai baat nahi charcha hi nahi vishay hi nahi hai wo sara mere ko demo mein le chuka hun lekin main deliver nahi karunga product to main promotion mein product dalne mein saktiyon mein kyun jaunga main.
Executive: Nahi aap bol rahe hain ki aapki ek aur product hai jisko aap chala rahe hain to.
Customer: Ek aur product nahi yahi meri ek aur firm thi Tirth export naam se registered hai aap chahe jis number se main call kar raha hun us number pe aap baat kar lena maine kal bhi unhe bataya tha ye cheez lekin maine GST close karana pada covid mujhe to maine dobara fir se business shuru kiya fir maine IndiaMART pe registration karaya kyunki mera bharosa tha yahan se kaam badhe milega mujhe main IndiaMART ki koi galti nahi maine sirf itna kaha bhai teen abhi sadhe teen mahine maan lo fir bhi to bhi sadhe aath mahine bacha hua hai mere paas mein abhi 25% time nikala hai 75% period bacha hua hai main business nahi chala pa raha hun mera paisa wahan fasaga hua hai aap kya fas gaya hai to main kuch keh nahi sakta baki aap decide karo maine apni problem yahi bar bar batai ki mujhe IndiaMART se koi dikkat nahi mera business nahi run kar pa raha hai.
Executive: Fir bhi main management se discuss kar leta hun jo solution milega waise chances kam hai main fir bhi aapko update kar dunga kal tak baat karke ek baar aur.
Customer: Aap please bata dena unko us baat mera main koi naya nahi hun IndiaMART main janta nahi hun koi kami unka business fas gaya lakh uska bad luck hai aadmi ka sara lakh rupya utna fas gaya aage 30 35000 yahan bhi de diya to wo pareshan hai isliye wo cha raha refund main baat kar leta hun aur uska sort out ho gaya nikal bhi aaunga bahar to main dobara lead to chahiye na business ke liye chahiye to main fir registration kara lunga aage 30 35000 kya badi cheez hai agar mujhe 6 7 lakh mera free ho jaye main turant fir dobara registration kara lunga hmm hai na aap ek baar baat kar lena mere ko dikkat nahi bhai aage badhna hai IndiaMART ke against thodi jaunga agar mujhe kal aage jana hai main apni company ko black list thodi karunga IndiaMART se.
Executive: Sir main baat karta hun jo solution wo batayenge main aapko update kar deta hun theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai ji theek hai sir okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund due to business issues.

- Business partner dispute affecting product delivery.

- Feels promotion is not beneficial.



Resolution:

- Explained refund policy not applicable.

- Suggested temporarily removing products.

- Executive will discuss with management for solution.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update customer by tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, business issues, product delivery, promotion
